text:
Your homepage must answer in 5 seconds:

1. What do you do? (Clear headline)
2. Who is it for? (Target audience)
3. What do I do next? (One obvious button)
Does yours pass the test?
#HomepageDesign #Messaging #UserExperience

"AI is too expensive for my business."
Wrong.
Most useful AI tools:
• Chatbot: $49/month
• Email automation: $29/month
• Analytics: $99/month
Total: Less than one employee hour/day.
What's holding you back from AI?
#AITools #SmallBusiness #AffordableTech
